name: Game of Death (PeteMakesThings)
description:
A 3 hr game for Trijam 131 Genetics

Shoot things, dodge, survive or die.

WASD/Arrows to move

Space/enter to fire

O to toggle CRT shader

SFX from Kenney.nl

https://kenney.nl/assets/sci-fi-sounds

CRT Shader

https://godotshaders.com/shader/vhs-and-crt-monitor-effect/
